text: Recent update date: 2022-04-11
label: Policy Change

text: Dear 12306 users ("user" or "you"): We updated the Privacy Policy.
label: Policy Change

text: The updated version adds the information that the shortcut refund service needs to provide.
label: Policy Change

text: Welcome to visit 12306!

12306 reminds you: 12306 network is an important window for railway service customers. It is operated by the China Railway Science Research Institute Group Co., Ltd. and the headquarters is located at No. 2 Dali Shushu Road, Haidian District, Beijing.
label: Contact Information

text: This privacy policy is closely related to the use of 12306 products or services on the 12306 network (hereinafter referred to as "service"). Please carefully read and confirm that you have fully understood and agree with the privacy policy, especially the thickened or lower line.Content.
12306 knows the importance of personal privacy and will do its best to protect your personal information security and reliable.

We are committed to maintaining your trust in us, abiding by the following principles, and protecting your personal information: the principles of consistency and responsibility, the principles of clear purpose, the principles of consent, the principle of minimum necessary necessary, the principles of safety, the principles of subject participation, and the principle of openness and transparency.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Adhere to the following principles, protect your personal information: the principles of consistent power and responsibility, the principles of clear purpose, the principle of selection consent, the principle of minimum necessary necessary, the principle of safety, the principle of subject participation, the principle of openness and transparency, etc.

text: We will also take corresponding security protection measures to protect your personal information in accordance with the mature safety standards of the industry.
The personal information we collected during your use of the 12306 network will be used only in this "Privacy Policy".

Article 8 of this privacy policy specifies the personal information protection of minors. If you are the legal guardian of minor users, please carefully read the terms of the protection of minors and choose whether to agree with the privacy policy.At the same time, please educate and guide minors to enhance personal information protection awareness and ability. If without your consent, do not provide any personal information to any product and service provider;
label: Specific Audiences

text: If you are a minor user, use our products and services to obtain your legal guardian's consent or provide information to us.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: Minor users should use products and services or provide information on the premise of obtaining the consent of the legal guardian.

text: In order to comply with the "Provisions on the Protection of Children's Personal Information Network", we have further stipulated personal information protection measures under the age of 14.
label: Specific Audiences

1. How to collect and use your personal information
You understand and agree:

In order to bring you a better product and service experience, we are continuously working hard to improve our technology. Then we may launch new or optimized functions from time to time, and we may need to collect, use new personal information or change personal informationPurpose or method.

In this regard, we will explain to you by updating this privacy policy or through pop -ups or page prompts, etc. The collection purpose, scope and usage method of personal information, and collect and use your personal information after obtaining your consent.
label: Usage
Data Security
First Party Collection Information

text: "Personal information" refers to a variety of information that can be recorded alone or with other information to identify a specific natural person's identity or reflects the activity of specific natural persons alone with other information.

"Personal sensitive information" refers to personal information once leaked, illegally provided or abuses the security of people's body and property, and it is easy to lead to personal information such as personal reputation, physical and mental health damage or discriminatory treatment.

The contents of the above personal information and personal sensitive information are contained in Appendix A (Data Appendix A)-Personal Information Example and Appendix B (Data Material Appendix) -The content of personal sensitive information.
(1) Collect and use the basic functions of your personal information

Our services include some basic functions. These functions include the functions necessary for realizing online ticket purchase, improving the functions necessary for our services and ensuring the functions necessary for transaction security.
We need to collect, save, and use the following personal information to achieve these basic functions.

text: 2. How to share, transfer, and publicly disclose your personal information
(1) Sharing

According to your choice and authorization or in accordance with the exception of "sharing, transfer, and public disclosure of personal information, the consent of authorization in advance", we may share your order information, account information, contact information, and location information to the third partyTo ensure the smooth completion of the services provided for you.

text: 10. Change of this privacy policy
The content of this privacy policy may be updated from time to time to adapt to the development of law, technology or business.
label: Policy Change

text: The updated privacy policy will be announced on the 12306 website, and major changes will be informed of users in a suitable form such as website announcement and user notification.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: The updated privacy policy will be announced on the 12306 website, and major changes will be informed of users in a suitable form such as website announcement and user notification.

text: The major changes in this privacy policy include:
label: Policy Change

text: (1) Our service model has changed significantly, such as the purpose of handling personal information, the type of personal information, the use of personal information, etc.;
label: Policy Change

text: (2) We have undergone major changes in the aspects of ownership structure and organizational structure, such as changes in the owner caused by business adjustments, bankruptcy mergers and acquisitions, etc.
label: Policy Change

text: (3) The main object of personal information sharing, transfer or public disclosure changes;
label: Policy Change

text: (4) The right to participate in personal information processing and its exercise methods have changed significantly;
label: Policy Change

text: (5) When we are responsible for handling the responsibility departments, contact methods and complaint channels of personal information security;
label: Policy Change

text: (6) Evaluation report on personal information security impact indicates that there is a high risk.
label: Policy Change

text: When you use our website, you can review our privacy policies at any time so that you can understand its modification.
You can check the latest update date of this privacy policy on the "recent update" date at the top of the privacy notice.
